BadgeDetail.Name: Sports Trainer
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated the ability to commit to a long-term training programme running alongside their academic studies, significantly improving their health and wellbeing.

Task.Title: Data analytics
Task.Body: Upload training programme and data tracking your progression over the duration of the programme. Data must be in the form of graphs and demonstrate the journey taken.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload training programme and data tracking your progression over the duration of the programme. Data must be in the form of graphs and demonstrate the journey taken.
